hero.title: Fitness for the whole family
hero.subtitle: From kids' programs to senior fitness, we offer something for everyone under one roof. State-of-the-art equipment, group classes, personal training, pool, and childcare. Get fit together at FitLife!

about.title: Welcome to FitLife
about.subtitle: Where families get healthy together
about.content: For nearly 20 years, FitLife has been the premier family fitness destination. With 50,000 sq ft of space, we offer cardio and strength equipment, indoor pool, basketball court, group fitness studios, kids' zone, and so much more.

products.name: Individual Adult
products.description: Full gym access, all group classes, pool, and sauna. Perfect for adults 18+.

products.name: Family Plan (4 people)
products.description: Best value! Full access for up to 4 family members. Includes kids' programs and childcare.

products.name: Senior Membership (62+)
products.description: Special rate for seniors with access to all amenities plus senior-specific classes.

products.name: Personal Training Package
products.description: Four 1-on-1 training sessions with certified personal trainers. Customized to your goals.

products.name: Youth Sports Program
products.description: Basketball, swimming, and fitness classes for kids 6-16. Build skills and confidence.

products.name: Day Pass
products.description: Try us out for a day. Full access to all facilities and classes.

services.title: What We Offer
services.subtitle: Everything you need under one roof

items.text: My whole family has memberships and we love it! The kids take swim lessons while I do yoga. It's made fitness a family priority.
items.author: Jennifer Taylor
items.title: Mom of 3

items.text: The senior fitness classes are perfect for my fitness level. The instructors are patient and the community is wonderful.
items.author: Robert Wilson
items.title: Senior Member

items.text: Lost 40lbs working with a personal trainer here. The facility is always clean and the staff is incredibly supportive!
items.author: David Martinez
items.title: 2-Year Member

members.name: Lisa Anderson
members.title: Fitness Director
members.bio: 15+ years in fitness management. Certified personal trainer specializing in family fitness and creating inclusive programs for all ages and abilities.

steps.title: Free Guest Pass
steps.description: Come tour the facility and try us out for free

steps.title: Choose Your Plan
steps.description: Individual, family, or senior membership options

steps.title: Get Oriented
steps.description: Complimentary equipment orientation and facility tour

steps.title: Start Your Journey
steps.description: Take classes, swim, lift, and achieve your goals
